Here's a rewritten paragraph about the significance of the Pythagorean Theorem in geometry:

The Pythagorean Theorem holds immense importance in geometry, possessing a profound impact on various branches of mathematics and science. This fundamental concept enables us to calculate the length of the hypotenuse of a right-angled triangle, given the lengths of its other two sides.
